body_html:
What do you mean by document?

As far as I remember, here function _MeanSquareGrad is used to define gradent of loss op and param grad is a tensor that golds gradients of "some global function" with respect to output of loss op. See my previous comment.

What do you mean by document?
As far as I remember, here function _MeanSquareGrad is used to define gradent of loss op and param grad is a tensor that golds gradients of "some global function" with respect to output of loss op. See my previous comment.
body:
What do you mean by document?

As far as I remember, [here](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/1095#issuecomment-378592178) function `_MeanSquareGrad` is used to define gradent of `loss` op and param `grad` is a tensor that golds gradients of "some global function" with respect to output of `loss` op. See [my previous comment](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/1095#issuecomment-384059102).
